General.Name: Wuxi ETEK Microelectronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi ETEK Micro-Electronics Co.,Ltd. manufactures analog integrated circuits (IC). The company offers power ICs, such as LDO converters and ESD/EOS protectors, DC-DC converters and voltage monitors, li-battery chargers, OVP switches, load switches, and current limit switches; signal and sense ICs, which include analog switches, level shifters, I/O expanders, PD controllers, audio ICs, and hall switches; display and LED drivers, including fun LED drivers, LED and LCD matrix drivers, and flash LED drivers; and e-detonator net ICs, IR controllers, and logic ICs. Its products are used for various applications, such as wireless charging interface, linear charger with power path management, type-c mix switch, type-c PD controller, high performance 3A dual-rail LDO, and load switch. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Wuxi, China.
General.Address: No. 8, Xinhui Circle Road, Wuxi, China, 214028
